title: Alistar the Cancer support

embed.description: How is Alistar allowed to exist in this state?! This is beyond a joke, being able to tower dive not because you are fed, or have armor, just simply one ability that effectively removes towers. Riot needs to nerf the shit out of this champion. He is a joke, even at an LCS/pro level.

body:
Can we finally nerf or change alistar's ult. Such a joke, pick or ban in pro games as well. AND they have 5 man communication. Even if you lose as alistar, it just doesn't feel fair when he removes a tower from a fight. 


Yes there is SOME counter play, but being able to do silly dives at level 6 with no items and just snowball a game is unfair.

replies.body:
His pre 6 is weak af, and if he fails his E-Q combo he gets punished by long cd and mana cost.

But yeah, ult is pretty bs atm.
